constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 73 (Tuesday, May 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PFLUGER:
H.R. 7659.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
No Fedreal funds authorized to be appropriated or
otherwise made available to the Secretary of Homeland
Secuirty may be made available for the establishment of a
Disinformation Governance Board.
[Page H4714]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight, Management, and Accountability.

title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to establish a Disinformation Governance Board.
